20110110233141.000|20110110233144.000|CC1|THE MASSACRE IN TUCSON.

20110110233214.000|20110110233214.000|CC1|WENTS.

20110110233423.000|20110110233425.000|CC1|SHRIVELED UP ORANGES AT HIS

20110110233439.000|20110110233443.000|CC1|BEN McGAHEE TAUGHT LOUGHNER AT

20110110233445.000|20110110233448.000|CC1|STRANGE AND DISRUPTIVE

20110110233455.000|20110110233458.000|CC1|ADOLF HITLER AND THE COMMUNIST

20110110233508.000|20110110233509.000|CC1|>> HIS CLASSMATES WERE

20110110233511.000|20110110233513.000|CC1|HE WILL BE OUT OF CLASS SOON

20110110233521.000|20110110233523.000|CC1|HIM AND REMEMBERS HIM AS

20110110233538.000|20110110233539.000|CC1|ARMY BUT WAS REJECTED BECAUSE   
20110110233539.000|20110110233545.000|CC1|HE FAILED THE DRUG TEST.        
20110110233545.000|20110110233548.000|CC1|AND LOOK AT THIS.

20110110233604.000|20110110233605.000|CC1|"BODIES" PLAYS IN THE           
20110110233605.000|20110110233608.000|CC1|BACKGROUND AS LOUGHNER SETS     
20110110233608.000|20110110233609.000|CC1|FIRE TO THE AMERICAN FLAG.

20110110233639.000|20110110233641.000|CC1|>> SARAH PALIN IS DENOUNCING    
20110110233641.000|20110110233644.000|CC1|ACCUSATIONS THAT HER RHETORIC   
20110110233644.000|20110110233644.000|CC1|MADE AN IMPRESSION ON THE       
20110110233644.000|20110110233646.000|CC1|DISTURBED MAN WHO SHOT          
20110110233646.000|20110110233646.000|CC1|GIFFORDS.                       
20110110233646.000|20110110233648.000|CC1|SHE E-MAILED THIS STATEMENT TO  
20110110233648.000|20110110233649.000|CC1|CONSERVATIVE HOST GLENN BECK    
20110110233649.000|20110110233651.000|CC1|WHO READ IT ON HIS RADIO SHOW.  
20110110233651.000|20110110233654.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE NUT JOBS ON ALL    
20110110233654.000|20110110233654.000|CC1|SIDES.                          
20110110233654.000|20110110233655.000|CC1|TERROR IS TERROR.               
20110110233655.000|20110110233658.000|CC1|I DON'T CARE IF IT'S FOR ALA OR 
20110110233658.000|20110110233659.000|CC1|FOR YOUR PARTY.                 
20110110233659.000|20110110233700.000|CC1|YOU ARE NOT A TREATMENT FIGHTER 
20110110233700.000|20110110233701.000|CC1|BUT A KILLER.                   
20110110233701.000|20110110233703.000|CC1|>> AMERICA AWOKE MONDAY TO A    
20110110233703.000|20110110233704.000|CC1|CHORUS OF VOICES MAKING A       
20110110233704.000|20110110233705.000|CC1|CONNECTION BETWEEN PALIN AND    
20110110233705.000|20110110233708.000|CC1|THE TRAGEDY IN ARIZONA.         
20110110233708.000|20110110233709.000|CC1|>> THE ATTACK HAS REOPENED      
20110110233709.000|20110110233713.000|CC1|CRITICISM OF THE WAY PALIN      
20110110233713.000|20110110233714.000|CC1|TARGETED GABBY GIFFORDS AND 19

20110110235438.000|20110110235438.000|CC1|When it becomes hard to ignore  
20110110235438.000|20110110235441.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110110235441.000|20110110235443.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110110235443.000|20110110235444.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110110235444.000|20110110235444.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110110235444.000|20110110235447.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110110235447.000|20110110235447.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110110235447.000|20110110235450.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110110235450.000|20110110235450.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110110235450.000|20110110235453.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110110235453.000|20110110235453.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110110235453.000|20110110235453.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110110235453.000|20110110235456.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110110235456.000|20110110235456.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110110235456.000|20110110235459.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110110235459.000|20110110235459.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110110235459.000|20110110235501.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110110235501.000|20110110235501.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110110235501.000|20110110235504.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110110235504.000|20110110235504.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110110235504.000|20110110235505.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110110235505.000|20110110235505.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110110235505.000|20110110235508.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110110235508.000|20110110235508.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110110235508.000|20110110235510.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110110235510.000|20110110235510.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110110235510.000|20110110235513.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110110235513.000|20110110235513.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110110235513.000|20110110235515.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110110235515.000|20110110235515.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110110235515.000|20110110235518.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110110235518.000|20110110235519.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110110235519.000|20110110235519.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110110235519.000|20110110235522.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110110235522.000|20110110235522.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110110235522.000|20110110235524.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110110235524.000|20110110235524.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110110235524.000|20110110235526.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110110235526.000|20110110235526.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110110235526.000|20110110235529.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20110110235529.000|20110110235529.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20110110235529.000|20110110235532.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
